mapper.select: SELECT user_using, user_id, user_time FROM user WHERE user_id = '${user_id}' AND user_pw = '${user_pw}'
SELECT computer_using, computer_status, computer_id FROM computer WHERE computer_id = '${computer_id}'
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET user_using = 1 WHERE user_id = '${user_id}'
UPDATE computer SET computer_using = 1 WHERE computer_id = ${computer_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_computer(user_id, computer_id, start, end) VALUES('${user_id}', ${computer_id}, '${start}', '${end}')
